text: Hi Zach,  can you please try to create a new page and see if the changes are coming through with the new page?
That worked! However, shouldn't I be able to see changes made in code? This has me very concerned if I have to blow away a page and rebuild it to see the changes made.

Are there any theme examples that I can use for building a theme with:
• a navigation menu that displays when a viewer starts to scroll back up when they have scrolled past the top of a page
• multiple versions of the menu for home page vs. everything else (examples below)
Thanks in advance!
